column1: Rampachodavaram is a census town in East Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is located in Rampachodavaram mandal of Rampachodavaram revenue division.  Rampachodavaram is known for its dense jungle and waterfalls which can be accessed by road transport only.
Chodavaram is located at 17.4500°N 81.7667°E﻿ / 17.4500; 81.7667. It has an average elevation of 162 metres (534 ft).
